name: get_channel_links
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool kick_com_api_kick_api.
Tool description: Detailed Kick.com API. Streamers, categories, chats, users and more.
API description: Fetches the links associated with a specified channel from the Kick API using the provided RapidAPI key.

channel_name.description: The name of the channel to retrieve links for. Defaults to 'gmhikaru'.
